subject: R..e.: Possible me.eting
body:
Hi there lovely,
This kind of opportunity comes ones in a life. I don't want 
to miss it. Do you? I am coming to your placea in few days 
and I though may be we can meet each other. If you don't mind
I can send you my picture. I am a girl.
You can correspond with me using my email ozywa@BounceEmail.info
